column4: I'm having some problems writing to HFS+ in Ubuntu; I've tried doing sudo mount -t hfsplus /dev/sdb1 -rw /media/hfsplus but I get "Read-only file-system" when I attempt to copy to it. Any ideas?
Ind[y] : I think you're better off asking that in #apache, but it's probably in /etc/apache2/httpd.conf or apache2.conf
